      • onStart

        public void onStart()
        Description copied from interface: PlanBody
        This method is executed just once before starting this plan body execution. Therefore, it acts as a prolog to the task represented by this plan body.
        Specified by:
        onStart in interface PlanBody
        Overrides:
        onStart in class jade.core.behaviours.Behaviour
        See Also:
        Behaviour.onStart()
